}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include boundsPredprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @include boundsPostprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot the boundary decision cutpoints

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the response rate on the futility and efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' boundaries, and is used together with \code{\link{boundsPredprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' and \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z an output of \code{\link{boundsPredprob}} and

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param area color the futility/efficacy stop area

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param grid show the grid of y-axis or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param yt  indicate the y axis: response rate is "p", number of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' is "x"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add  add the boundary lines or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cols specific the color of `[1]` efficacy area `[2]` futility area

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' `[3]` efficacy boundary `[4]` futility boundary

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lwds line width (a two dimensional vector)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ltype line type

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lpch  a value of plotting characters or symbols

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lcex a value giving the amount by which plotting characters and

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' symbols should be scaled relative to the default.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param gy a value to adjust the gray level of the plot (default 20),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' applies when \code{grid==TRUE}

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only produces the plot as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotBounds.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
plotBounds <- function(z, area = TRUE, grid = TRUE, yt = "x", add = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
                       cols = c("green", "red", "darkgreen", "orange"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
                       lwds = c(3, 3), ltype = "l", lpch = 16, lcex = 1, gy = 20) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- nrow(z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
  nmin <- min(z$nvec)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  nmax <- max(z$nvec)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
  if (yt == "x") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$xL

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$xU

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- nmax

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- nmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Number of Responses"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = floor(yU / gy))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (yt == "p") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$pL

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$pU

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Response Rate"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = yU / gy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("yt can only be x or p")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
  if (add) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[3], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[4], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(z$nvec, rep(0, n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    xlim = c(0, max(z$nvec)), ylim = c(0, yU), type = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = "n", ylab = ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  if (grid) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = gridy, col = "gray")

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  if (area) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$nvec, nmax, nmin), c(z2, yU, yU2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[1], border = cols[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$nvec, nmax, nmin), c(z1, 0, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2],

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[2], border = cols[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[1], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[2], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
  return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The Probability Density Function of the difference of two Beta Distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Density, distribution function and quantile function for

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' the distribution of the difference of two Beta distributions with parameters `parX` and `parY`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' We denote `X` and `Y` as two random variables representing the response rate of Control and Treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' group respectively. The assignment of Control and Treatment is practically interchangeable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' We denote `Z` as the difference between two groups such that `Z = Y-X`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed z : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of differences between Control and Treatment arms such that `Z = Y-X`

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parX : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'  two parameters of `X`'s Beta distribution (Control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parY : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  two parameters of `Y`'s Beta distribution (Treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed eps : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'  lowest floating point number as lower bound of integration

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed rel.tol : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'  used in [stats::integrate()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The density values

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @note `X` and `Y` can be either Control or Treatment and `Z = X-Y`, subject to assumptions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
dbetadiff <- function(z, parY, parX, eps = .Machine$double.eps, rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    114x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(z, min.len = 1, finite = TRUE, any.missing = TRUE, null.ok = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    114x
                    
                      
  ret <- z

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    114x
                    
                      
  is_z_pos <- z >= 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    114x
                    
                      
  is_z_neg <- z < 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    114x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parY, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    114x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parX, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    114x
                    
                      
  assert_number(eps, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    114x
                    
                      
  integrandPos <- function(x, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1361x
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1361x
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = x, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
        # x + zval = y, if z = y - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1361x
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = x + zval, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    114x
                    
                      
  integrandNeg <- function(y, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5236x
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    5236x
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = y, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
        # y - zval = x, if  z = y - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    5236x
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = y - zval, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    114x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[is_z_pos]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    632x
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    632x
                    
                      
      f = integrandPos,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
      # We transform the bounds to follow the support of integrandPos here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    632x
                    
                      
      lower = eps,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
      # The upper bounds here are between 0 and 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    632x
                    
                      
      upper = 1 - z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    632x
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    632x
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    632x
                    
                      
      rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    632x
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    113x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[is_z_neg]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1742x
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1742x
                    
                      
      f = integrandNeg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
      # We transform the bounds to follow the support of integrandNeg.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1742x
                    
                      
      lower = eps,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      # The upper bounds here are between 0 and 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1742x
                    
                      
      upper = 1 + z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1742x
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1742x
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1742x
                    
                      
      rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1742x
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    113x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta difference Cumulative Probability Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the Cumulative Probability Function of the Beta difference for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed q : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The probability distribution value

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/pbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
pbetadiff <- function(q, parY, parX, rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    31x
                    
                      
  stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    31x
                    
                      
    f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    31x
                    
                      
    parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    31x
                    
                      
    parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    31x
                    
                      
    lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    31x
                    
                      
    upper = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    31x
                    
                      
    subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    31x
                    
                      
    rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    31x
                    
                      
  )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta difference Quantile Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the quantile of the Beta difference for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of probabilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The quantile values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats uniroot

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname qbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/qbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
qbetadiff <- function(p, parY, parX, eps = .Machine$double.eps) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    2x
                    
                      
  target <- function(q) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    26x
                    
                      
    pbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    26x
                    
                      
      q = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    26x
                    
                      
      parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    26x
                    
                      
      parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    26x
                    
                      
    ) - p

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    2x
                    
                      
  eps <- 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
  stats::uniroot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    2x
                    
                      
    f = target,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    2x
                    
                      
    interval = c(-1 + eps, 1 - eps)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    2x
                    
                      
  )$root

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include postprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random distance for [h_get_distance()] helper function

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [h_get_distance()] by first calculating non-overlapping

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' distance between looks if looks are of minimum length of 2 elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nn : number or numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  the union of `nnE` and `nnF`, if futility analysis or looks are supplied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A number providing the wiggle distance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
h_dist0 <- function(nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    1413x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nn, lower = 1, unique = TRUE, sorted = TRUE, min.len = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    1411x
                    
                      
  ceiling(min(nn - c(0, nn[-length(nn)])) / 2) - 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random distance in given looks for sample sizes for Efficacy and Futility.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] to generate random distance's wiggle room around looks `nn`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_dist0

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric with `length(nn)-1` elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
h_get_distance <- function(nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1406x
                    
                      
  dist0 <- h_dist0(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1404x
                    
                      
  sample(-dist0:dist0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    1404x
                    
                      
    size = length(nn) - 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1404x
                    
                      
    replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    1404x
                    
                      
    prob = 2^(-abs(-dist0:dist0) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating looks from random distance

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] that applies the numeric element of `dist` to looks `nn`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed dist : numeric or logical

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'  distance for random looks around the look locations in `nn`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'  where `dist` is generated from [h_get_distance()] in a numeric of at least one element.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'  If `NULL`, only one location look will be set at `nnE` or `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Efficacy decision. If different for Futility decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'  specify in `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnF : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Futility decision if different from Efficacy decision.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Uses distance from [h_get_distance()] to add to looks, creating wiggled looks:

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nnrE` is the result for Efficacy looks with random distance added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nnrF` is the result for Futility looks with random distance added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
h_get_looks <- function(dist, nnE, nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1405x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(dist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1405x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1405x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1405x
                    
                      
  nn <- unique(c(nnE, nnF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1405x
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn + c(dist, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1405x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1405x
                    
                      
    nnrE = nnr[nn %in% nnE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1405x
                    
                      
    nnrF = nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] to generate numeric of decisions `decisions` and random looks `all_sizes`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnr : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'  union of `nnE`and `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed truep : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'  assumed true response rate or true rate (scenario).

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p0 : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'  lower Futility threshold of response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p1 : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'  upper Efficacy threshold of response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed tL : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'  posterior probability threshold for being below `p0`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed tU : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'  posterior probability threshold for being above `p1`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'  alpha and beta parameters for the prior on the treatment population.

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'  Default set at alpha = 1, beta = 1, or uniform prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements :

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decision <- function(nnr, truep, p0, p1, parE = c(1, 1), nnE, nnF, tL, tU) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_number(p0, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_number(p1, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, min.len = 2, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    100001x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    100001x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    100001x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    100001x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    100001x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    100001x
                    
                      
  response <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = truep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    100001x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look <= length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    127424x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    118263x
                    
                      
      qL <- 1 - postprob(x = sum(response[1:size_look]), n = size_look, p = p0, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    118263x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    127424x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    127424x
                    
                      
      qU <- postprob(x = sum(response[1:size_look]), n = size_look, p = p1, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    127424x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qU < tU, decision, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    127424x
                    
                      
    all_sizes <- size_look

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    127424x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    127424x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    100001x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    100001x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    100001x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' Creating list for operating characteristics

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' Generates operating characteristics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnrE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'  looks with random distance, if applied on `nnE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnrF : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'  looks with random distance, if applied on `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed all_sizes : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample sizes of all looks simulated `length(sim)` times if `dist` applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed decision : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'  Go, Stop or Gray Zone decisions of all looks simulated `length(sim)` times.

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list of results containing :

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
h_get_oc <- function(all_sizes, nnr, decision, nnrE, nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(all_sizes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_logical(decision, len = length(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrE, lower = 0, upper = max(nnrE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrF, lower = 0, upper = max(nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    13x
                    
                      
  sim <- length(all_sizes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    13x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    13x
                    
                      
  data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    13x
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(all_sizes, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrStopEarly = mean(all_sizes < Nmax, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(decision * (all_sizes < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - decision) * (all_sizes < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(decision, na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - decision, na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    13x
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(decision)) / sim

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' Operating Characteristics for Posterior Probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for posterior probability method.

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' It is assumed that the true response rate is `truep`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for Efficacy if the posterior probability to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
