                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
boundsPredprob <- function(nvec, Nmax = max(nvec), p, tT, phiL, phiU, a, b) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
  znames <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    "xL", "pL", "ppL", "postL", "UciL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
    "xU", "pU", "ppU", "postU", "LciU"

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
  z <- matrix(NA, length(nvec), length(znames))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
  dimnames(z) <- list(nvec, znames)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
  k <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
  for (n in nvec) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    k <- k + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    # initialize so will return NA if 0 or n in "continue" region

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    xL <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    xU <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    for (x in 0:n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
      pp <- predprob(x, n, Nmax, p, tT, parE = c(a, b))$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
      if (pp <= phiL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
        xL <- x

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
      if (pp >= phiU) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
        xU <- x

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
        # done: leave innermost for loop

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
        break

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    # reset xU to NA if phiU=1 and n<Nmax

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
    if (n < Nmax && phiU == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
      xU <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    # calculate predictive and posterior probabilities at boundaries

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
    ppL <- predprob(xL, n, Nmax, p, tT, parE = c(a, b))$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    ppU <- predprob(xU, n, Nmax, p, tT, parE = c(a, b))$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    postL <- postprob(xL, n, p, parE = c(a, b))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    postU <- postprob(xU, n, p, parE = c(a, b))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    # calculate lower CI at boundaries

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    UciL <- ifelse(!is.na(xL), stats::binom.test(xL, n, alt = "less")$conf.int[2], NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    LciU <- ifelse(!is.na(xU), stats::binom.test(xU, n, alt = "greater")$conf.int[1], NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
    z[k, ] <- c(xL, xL / n, ppL, postL, UciL, xU, xU / n, ppU, postU, LciU)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  return(round(data.frame(nvec, z), 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include postprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate Posteriors based on Efficacy and Futility Thresholds in Two-Armed trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function adapted from [h_get_decision()] by

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' replacing the internal use of [postprob()] with [postprobDist()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' to generate the `decision` and random looks `all_sizes`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams postprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_oc

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaE : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin by which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group` in Efficacy looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaF : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin by which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group` in Futility looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decisionDist <- function(nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                               nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                               nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                               truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                               parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
                               parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
                               tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
                               tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
                               deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                               deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                               relativeDelta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrE, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrF, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1403x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1403x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1403x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1403x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1403x
                    
                      
  response <- stats::rbinom(max(nnr), size = 1, truep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1403x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look <= length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    2396x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    2017x
                    
                      
      qL <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2017x
                    
                      
        x = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2017x
                    
                      
        n = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2017x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2017x
                    
                      
        nS = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    2017x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    2017x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    2017x
                    
                      
        parE = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2017x
                    
                      
        parS = parE

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    2017x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2396x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2290x
                    
                      
      qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2290x
                    
                      
        x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2290x
                    
                      
        n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2290x
                    
                      
        xS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    2290x
                    
                      
        nS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    2290x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    2290x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    2290x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    2290x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    2290x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qU < tU, decision, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    2396x
                    
                      
    all_sizes <- size_look

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    2396x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2396x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1403x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1403x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1403x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate Operating characteristics of Posterior Probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' with Beta Prior on the Control or Standard of Care Arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for Efficacy if the posterior probability of assumed

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' true response rate or `truep` is better than the control arm by at least

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' `deltaE`, is larger than `tU`. Analogously, The trial is stopped for Efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' if the posterior probability of assumed true response rate or `truep` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' better than the control arm by at least `deltaF`, is larger than `tL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' for Futility looks. If these criteria are not met, the trial is continued

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' and at the maximum sample size, it may reach no decision or "gray zone".The

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' following represents the stopping criteria for Efficacy and Futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' respectively.

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Efficacy :

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(truep > P_S + deltaE) > tU`

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Futility :

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(truep < P_S - deltaF) > tL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' Where `truep` is the assumed true rate of response and `p1` and `p0` respectively are

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' the thresholds for Efficacy and Futility respectively.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' Resulting operating characteristics include the following:

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPostprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams postprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_distance

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaE : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin of which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group`. Delta for Efficacy is used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'  calculate `P(truep > P_S + deltaE)` which should

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'  exceed threshold `tU` to to stop for Efficacy. `DeltaE` can also be negative in

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-inferiority setting. See also note.

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaF : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin of which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group`. Delta for Futility is used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'  calculate  `P(truep > P_S - deltaF)` which should

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'  exceed threshold `tL` to stop for Futility.`DeltaF` can also be negative in

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-inferiority setting. See also note.

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @note

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Delta :

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' The desired improvement is denoted as `deltaE` or `deltaF` and two options

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' exist in its use: The absolute case when `relativeDelta = FALSE` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' relative as when `relativeDelta = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. The absolute case is when we define an absolute delta, greater than `P_S`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' the response rate of the standard of care or control or `S` group such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(truep > P_S + deltaE | data)` for Efficacy looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' or `Pr(truep > P_S + deltaF | data)` for Futility looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' 2. In the relative case, we suppose that the treatment group's

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate is assumed to be greater than `P_S + (1-P_S) * delta` such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(truep > P_S + (1 - P_S) * deltaE | data)` for Efficacy looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' or `Pr(truep > P_S + (1 - P_S) * deltaF | data)` for Futility looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPostprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
ocPostprobDist <- function(nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
                           truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
                           deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
                           deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
                           relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
                           tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
                           tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
                           parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
                           parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
                           wiggle = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
                           sim = 50000,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
                           nnF = nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, min.len = 1, lower = 1, upper = max(nnE), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 100, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, min.len = 0, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    5x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    5x
                    
                      
  decision <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    5x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    5x
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    5x
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    5x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    5x
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    5x
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    5x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
  # simulate a clinical trial sim times

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    5x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    1400x
                    
                      
    if (length(nn) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
      # randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    400x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    400x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF) # we generate sim number of looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    400x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    400x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    1000x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    1000x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    1400x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(c(nnrE, nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    1400x
                    
                      
    tmp <- h_get_decisionDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    1400x
                    
                      
      nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    1400x
                    
                      
      nnrE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    1400x
                    
                      
      nnrF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    1400x
                    
                      
      truep = truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    1400x
                    
                      
      parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    1400x
                    
                      
      tL = tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    1400x
                    
                      
      tU = tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    1400x
                    
                      
      deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    1400x
                    
                      
      deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    1400x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    1400x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    1400x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    5x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc(all_sizes = all_sizes, nnr = nnr, decision = decision, nnrE = nnrE, nnrF = nnrF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    5x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    5x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    5x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    5x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    5x
                    
                      
    union_nn = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    5x
                    
                      
    input_nnE = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    5x
                    
                      
    input_nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggle_dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    5x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include predprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for predictive probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' with beta prior on SOC response rate (gray zone allowed in the final analysis)

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 1: The trial is stopped for efficacy if the predictive probability of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' successful trial is larger than phiU, and stopped for futility if it is below

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' phiL. A trial is successful if after the maximum number of patients the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' posterior probability of the treatment being at least delta better than the

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' control is above tT. Otherwise the decision is "failure". In this case, there is no

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 2:A variation can be requested when skipping the argument phiL and utilizing the arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' DeltaFu, tFu & PhiFu. The trial can be stopped for futility if the predictive

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' probability of an unsuccessful trial is larger than phiFu. In this case, the

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' decision is "failure" when the posterior probability of the treatment being

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' at most deltaFu better than the control is above tFu at the maximum number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyEff: probability to decide for efficacy early

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyFut: probability to decide for futility early

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nn vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p true rate (scenario)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param delta We want to be better than the control + delta (default: 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param deltaFu declare futility when worse than the control + deltaW.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify only when decision rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @param relativeDelta see \code{\link{postprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tT threshold for the probability to be above control + delta

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tFu threshold for the probability to be under control + deltaFu

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial. Specify only when decision rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiL lower threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiU upper threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiFu threshold on the predictive probability for futility. Specify only

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' when decision rule 2 is used. phiL argument should be skipped in this case.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE beta parameters for the prior on the treatment proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parS beta parameters for the prior on the control proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ns number of simulations

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nr generate random look locations? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d distance for random looks around the look locations in \code{nn}

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nnF vector of look locations for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' (default: same as efficacy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' oc: matrix with operating characteristics (see Details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision: vector of the decisions made in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' (\code{TRUE} for success, \code{FALSE} for failure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSize: vector of the sample sizes in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' nnE: vector of efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' nnF: vector of futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' params: input parameters of this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPredprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
ocPredprobDist <- function(nn, p, delta = 0, deltaFu = delta, relativeDelta = FALSE, tT, tFu = 1 - tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
                           phiL = 1 - phiFu, phiU, phiFu = 1 - phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
                           parE = c(a = 1, b = 1), parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
                           ns = 10000, nr = FALSE, d = NULL, nnF = nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  ## s: decision reject H0 (TRUE) or fail to reject (FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  ##    during trial if continuing (NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
  if (phiL + phiFu != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("Both phiL and phiFu arguments are specified, phiL will be overwrite by 1-phiFu")

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
  s <- rep(NA, ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- s

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  if (nr && is.null(d)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    ## set parameter d for randomly generating look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    d <- floor(min(nn - c(0, nn[-nL])) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
  for (k in 1:ns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    ## simulate a clinical trial ns times

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    if (nr && (d > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      ## randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
      dd <- sample(-d:d,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
        size = nL - 1, replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
        prob = 2^(c(-d:0, rev(-d:(-1))) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      nnr <- nn + c(dd, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr[nn %in% nnE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1, p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, delta = deltaFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = 1 - tFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
        )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qL >= phiFu, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
        qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
        )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qU < phiU, s[k], TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n), PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
