    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
    oc = oc, Decision = s, SampleSize = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
    nn = nn, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sumTable.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot a summary plot corresponding to the sumTable output

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will return a plot showing a curve of the prob of a meaningful improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' and a curve of the prob of a poor improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data the output object of \code{\link{sumTable}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Pos_cut a cut off for the prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Neg_cut a cut off for the prob of a poor improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the \code{data} item which was imputed to the function

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot par grid mtext box axis

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotDecision.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
plotDecision <- function(data, Pos_cut, Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  xticks <- seq(from = -50, to = 100, by = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    !
                    
                      
  x <- as.numeric(data[1, ]) # number of response;

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
  x.mode <- as.numeric(data[3, ]) # the response diff mode

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
  y <- as.numeric(data[6, ]) # The Prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  z <- as.numeric(data[7, ]) # The Prob of a not meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  # Look up decision area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
  ShadeData <- t(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
  colnames(ShadeData)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
  G_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
  R_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::par(mar = c(5, 4, 4, 1) + .1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(x.mode, y,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
    type = "n", xlim = range(x.mode), bty = "n", ylab = "Probability (%)", xaxt = "n", xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = expression(paste("Estimated diff.", sep = "")), ylim = c(0, 100), panel.first = grid()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # find the interaction;

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveG <- ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveR <- ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # Points always intersect when above=TRUE, then FALSE or reverse

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsG <- which(diff(aboveG) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsR <- which(diff(aboveR) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the slopes for each line segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesG <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "prob.go [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesR <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "prob.nogo [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
  x2.slopes <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the intersection for each segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsG <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Pos_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) / (x1.slopesG))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsG <- Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsR <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Neg_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) / (x1.slopesR))

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsR <- Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(c(R_area[, "mode [%]"], x.pointsR, x.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "mode [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    c(rep(0, dim(R_area)[1] + 1), y.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "prob.nogo [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "red"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      "%, Prob.nogo=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      x.pointsG, G_area[, "mode [%]"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "mode [%]"]), x.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      rep(0, dim(G_area)[1] + 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "prob.go [%]"]), y.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "green"

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
  ) # meaningful part;

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
      "%,Prob. go=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, y, col = "green", lwd = 3, type = "l") # Plot PDF of beta(R,NR);

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, z, col = "red", lwd = 3, type = "l")

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
  if (Pos_cut == Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = Pos_cut, col = "black", lwd = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::box()

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
  LablePoint2 <- unique(sort(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
    ceiling(min(x.mode) * 10) / 10,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
    xticks, floor(max(x.mode) * 10) / 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
  ))) ## Can be modified

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::axis(1, at = LablePoint2, labels = paste(LablePoint2, "%", sep = ""), las = 1, lwd = 2, cex.axis = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
  return(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include dbetabinom.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Posterior Probability of Efficacy Given Beta Prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the posterior probability to be above threshold assuming a beta prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' on the response rate such that the response rate in the experimental or treatment `E` exceeds

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' the threshold set to compute the posterior probability `p` :  `Pr(P_E > p | data)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior is `P_E ~ beta(a, b)`, with default set to be a uniform or beta(1,1).

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' We observed `x` successes in n trials and so the posterior is

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' `P_E | data  ~ beta(a + x, b + n - x)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of successes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed n : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'  threshold set to compute posterior probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed a : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'  first parameter `alpha` of the beta prior (successes).

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed b : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'  second parameter `beta` of the beta prior (failures).

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The posterior probability that the response rate P_E is above a threshold p.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/postprobBeta.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
postprobBeta <- function(x, n, p, a = 1, b = 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_number(n, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = n, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_number(a, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_number(b, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_number(p, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    3x
                    
                      
  stats::pbeta(p, a + x, b + n - x, lower.tail = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' Posterior Probability of Efficacy Given Beta-Mixture Prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the posterior probability that the response probability `P_E` is above a threshold.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' such that this posterior probability can be expressed as `Pr(P_E > p | data)`. Prior is

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' `P_E ~ sum(weights * beta(parE[, 1], parE[, 2]))`, i.e., a mixture of beta priors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' Default is one component only with uniform or `beta(1,1)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' We observed `x` successes in n trials.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Posterior is again a mixture of beta priors, with updated mixture weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' and beta parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of successes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed n : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'  threshold that `P_E` is measured.

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with `K` rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the `K` components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'  The mixture weights of the beta mixture prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed betamixPost : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'  optional result of `[h_getBetamixPost()]` in order

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'  to speed up the computations. If supplied, this is directly used, bypassing

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'  the other arguments (except `p` and `log.p` of course).

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log.p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether to return the log of the probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The posterior probability that the response rate `P_E` is above `p`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/postprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
postprob <- function(x, n, p, parE = c(1, 1), weights, betamixPost, log.p = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    347432x
                    
                      
  if (missing(betamixPost)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    336564x
                    
                      
    assert_flag(log.p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    336564x
                    
                      
    if (is.vector(parE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
      # Here there is only one component.

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    248165x
                    
                      
      assert_true(identical(length(parE), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
      # To get matrix with one row.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    248165x
                    
                      
      parE <- t(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    336564x
                    
                      
    assert_matrix(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    336564x
                    
                      
    if (missing(weights)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    248168x
                    
                      
      weights <- rep(1, nrow(parE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    336564x
                    
                      
    betamixPost <- h_getBetamixPost(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    336564x
                    
                      
      x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    336564x
                    
                      
      n = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    336564x
                    
                      
      par = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    336564x
                    
                      
      weights = weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    347432x
                    
                      
  assert_list(betamixPost)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    347432x
                    
                      
  assert_names(names(betamixPost), identical.to = c("par", "weights"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    347432x
                    
                      
  ret <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    347432x
                    
                      
    betamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    347432x
                    
                      
    pbetaMix(q = p, par = par, weights = weights, lower.tail = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    347432x
                    
                      
  if (log.p) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
    log(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    347432x
                    
                      
    ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
postprob <- Vectorize(postprob, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Binomial Density Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function of the beta-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta-binomial density function has the following form:

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `p(x) = (m! / (x!*(m-x)!)) * Beta(x+a,m-x+b) / Beta(a,b)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of successes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed m : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of trials.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed a : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  first parameter of the beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed b : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'  second parameter of the beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether to return the log density value (not default).

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The density values of the beta-binomial distribution at `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetabinom.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinom <- function(x, m, a, b, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    88748x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = m, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    88747x
                    
                      
  assert_number(m, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    88747x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(a, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    88747x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(b, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    88747x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(log)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    88747x
                    
                      
  log_ret <- lchoose(m, x) + lbeta(x + a, m - x + b) - lbeta(a, b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    88747x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
    log_ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    88747x
                    
                      
    exp(log_ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture-Binomial Density Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function for a mixture of beta-binomial distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior of length K.

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'  Each element corresponds to the row of beta parameters in `par`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether to return the log density value (not default).

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The (log) density values of the mixture of beta-binomial distributions at `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetabinomMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- function(x, m, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    88745x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par, min.rows = 1, min.cols = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    88745x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(log)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    88745x
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * dbetabinom(x, m, par[, 1], par[, 2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    88744x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    log(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    88744x
                    
                      
    ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- Vectorize(dbetabinomMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Beta-Mixture-Binomial Posterior Distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function that computes the posterior parameters of a beta-mixture-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinomMix

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the updated beta parameters and weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta dbinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
h_getBetamixPost <- function(x, n, par, weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    354188x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = n, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    354187x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(n, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    354187x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par, min.rows = 1, max.cols = 2, mode = "numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    354187x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, min.len = 0, len = nrow(par), finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # We renormalize weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    354184x
                    
                      
  weights <- weights / sum(weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  # We now compute updated parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    354184x
                    
                      
  postPar <- par

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    354184x
                    
                      
  postPar[, 1] <- postPar[, 1] + x

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    354183x
                    
                      
  postPar[, 2] <- postPar[, 2] + n - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  # We compute updated mixture probabilities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    354183x
                    
                      
  tmp <- exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    354183x
                    
                      
    lbeta(a = postPar[, 1], b = postPar[, 2]) - lbeta(a = par[, 1], b = par[, 2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  # We compute the updated weights of the posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    354183x
                    
                      
  postWeights <- weights * tmp / sum(weights * tmp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    354183x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(postWeights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    354183x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    354183x
                    
                      
    par = postPar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    354183x
                    
                      
    weights = postWeights

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture density function

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' This function calculates beta-mixture density values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta-mixture distribution is defined by K beta parameters and the corresponding weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinomMix

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether log values of the beta-mixture density function are returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the (log) density values

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
dbetaMix <- function(x, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    228152x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    228152x
                    
                      
  assert_true(all.equal(sum(weights), 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    228151x
                    
                      
  assert_true(identical(length(weights), nrow(par)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    228151x
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * dbeta(x, par[, 1], par[, 2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    228151x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    log(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    228151x
                    
                      
    ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
dbetaMix <- Vectorize(dbetaMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture CDF

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the CDF of the Beta-Mixture distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed q : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'  the abscissa.

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior which add up to 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed lower.tail : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'  if `TRUE` (default), probabilities are `P[X <= x]`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'  and otherwise `P[X > x]`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The (one minus) cdf value

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @note `q` can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/pbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
pbetaMix <- function(q, par, weights, lower.tail = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    594161x
                    
                      
  assert_number(q, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    594161x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    594161x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    594161x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(lower.tail)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    594161x
                    
                      
  sum(weights * pbeta(q, par[, 1], par[, 2], lower.tail = lower.tail))

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
pbetaMix <- Vectorize(pbetaMix, vectorize.args = "q")

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture Quantile Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the quantile of the Beta-Mixture distribution for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
