#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'  the required probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed lower.tail : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether CDF at x taken at lower or upper tail

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The abscissa.

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/qbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
qbetaMix <- function(p, par, weights, lower.tail = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    11477x
                    
                      
  f <- function(pi) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    29444x
                    
                      
    pbetaMix(q = pi, par = par, weights = weights, lower.tail = lower.tail) - p

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
  # Note: we give the lower and upper function values here in order to avoid problems for

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  # p = 0 or p = 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    11477x
                    
                      
  unirootResult <- uniroot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    11477x
                    
                      
    f,

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    11477x
                    
                      
    lower = 0, upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    11477x
                    
                      
    f.lower = -p, f.upper = 1 - p,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    11477x
                    
                      
    tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps) # Increase the precision over default `tol`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    11477x
                    
                      
  if (unirootResult$iter < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
    NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    11477x
                    
                      
    assert_number(unirootResult$root)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    11477x
                    
                      
    assert_true(all.equal(f(unirootResult$root), 0, tolerance = 0.001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    11477x
                    
                      
    unirootResult$root

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
qbetaMix <- Vectorize(qbetaMix, vectorize.args = "p")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' Launch the ShinyPhase1b app

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
##' Launch the ShinyPhase1b app in the default web browser.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
runShinyPhase1b <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
  appDir <- system.file("shinyapp", "ShinyPhase1b", package = "phase1b")

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    !
                    
                      
  if (appDir == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("Could not find phase1b app directory. Try re-installing `phase1b`.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::runApp(appDir, display.mode = "normal")

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
# reference https://www.r-bloggers.com/supplementing-your-r-package-with-a-shiny-app-2/;

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' Return summary statistics under one response scenario

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
##' This function will calculate the summary statistics for a specific response

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##' outcome scenario.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
##' @param thisResp number of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
##' @param TotalSample sample size

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cut_B a meaningful improvement threshold: at least cut_B (e.g. 15%) improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cut_W a poor improvement threshold: at most cut_W (e.g. 5%) improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parX non-negative parameters of the beta distribution of the control (posterior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
##' @param YPri non-negative parameters of the beta prior of the treatment, default Beta(0.5,0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
##' @param Round Rounding of the output statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
##' @return A vector with the results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
##' @example examples/sumTable.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
sumTable <- function(thisResp, # number of responses;

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
                     TotalSample, # Sample size;

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
                     cut_B, # meaningful improvement: at least cut_B (say 15\%) improvement;

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
                     cut_W, # poor improvement: at most cut_W (say 5\%) improvement;

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                     parX, # Two parameters of the beta distribution of the control (posterior);

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                     YPri = c(0.5, 0.5), # Prior of phase Ib trial, default Beta(0.5,0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                     Round = 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
  tmp <- sumBetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    !
                    
                      
    parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
    parY =

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    !
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
        thisResp + YPri[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
        TotalSample - thisResp + YPri[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
    cutB = cut_B,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    cutW = cut_W

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  summaries <- round(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    thisResp, thisResp / TotalSample * 100,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    tmp$mode * 100, tmp$ci * 100, tmp$go * 100, tmp$nogo * 100

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  ), Round)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
  summaries <- as.data.frame(summaries)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
  rownames(summaries) <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    "# resp", "obs ORR [%]", "mode [%]",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    "CI lower [%]", "CI upper [%]", "prob.go [%]", "prob.nogo [%]"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
  return(summaries)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' @include betadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##' Mode and Credible Interval Calculation for The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
##' A function to summerize the characters of a betadiff distribution \code{\link{dbetadiff}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parX two parameters of X's beta distribution (Control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parY two parameters of Y's beta distribution (Treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
##' @param level credible interval

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cutB  a cutoff value for the upper bound

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cutW  a cutoff value for the lower bound

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
##' @return sumbetadiff gives the mode, credible interval of the distribution function,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
##' along with the probabilities of above cutB and below cutW.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
##' @importFrom stats optimize integrate rbeta quantile

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
##' @example examples/sumbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
sumBetadiff <- function(parY, parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                        level = 0.9, ## CI level

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                        cutB,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                        cutW) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  res <- try(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
      mode <- stats::optimize(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
        interval = c(-0.999, 0.999),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
        maximum = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
      )$maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
      lower <- qbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
        p = (1 - level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
      upper <- qbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
        p = (1 + level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
      ## for Go:

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
      Out.go <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
        lower = cutB,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
        upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
      ## for Stop:

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
      Out.nogo <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
        lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
        upper = cutW,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
        mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
        ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
        go = Out.go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
        nogo = Out.nogo

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    silent = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  ## if there were any errors, fall back to Monte Carlo estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  if (inherits(res, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- stats::rbeta(n = 2e6, parY[1], parY[2]) -

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      rbeta(n = 2e6, parX[1], parX[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
    lower <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 - level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    upper <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 + level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    Out.go <- mean(samples > cutB)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    Out.nogo <- mean(samples < cutW)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- cut(samples, breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 1, length = 801))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- table(samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    mode <- seq(from = -1, to = 1, by = 0.0025)[which.max(samples)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    res <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
      go = Out.go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      nogo = Out.nogo

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
  return(res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Display the operating characteristics using an oc object

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Reads results from \code{\link{ocPredprob}}, \code{\link{ocPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' etc. and displays a bar plot of the operating characteristics

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z returned oc value

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only plots as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics barplot title

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotOc.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
plotOc <- function(z) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  ## plot function for oc.predprob or oc.postprob, or the dist versions of them

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::barplot(table(z$Decision, z$SampleSize) / z$params$sim, beside = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  ## get the parameter

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  parDat <- lapply(z$params, deparse)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  ## get parameters, which are saved in parDat

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
  allParNames <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
    "p", "p0", "p1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
    "delta", "deltaE", "deltaF", "relativeDelta",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
    "phiL", "phiU", "tL", "tU", "tT", "parE", "parS"

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  parInds <- which(names(parDat) %in% allParNames)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::title(paste(names(parDat[parInds]), parDat[parInds],

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
    sep = "=", collapse = ", "

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::title(xlab = paste(dimnames(z$oc)[[2]], signif(z$oc, 3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    sep = " = ", collapse = ", "

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}
